Verses: 1 mose Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Azhaippiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Isravelare, Naan Indru Ungal Kaadhugal Ketkach Sollum Kattalaigalaiyum Niyaayangalaiyum Kelungal; Neengal Avaigalinbadiye Seyyumbadikku Avaigalaik Katruk Kaikkollakkadaveergal.
2 nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Orepile Nammode Udanbadikkaipanninaar.
3 andha Udanbadikkaiyaik Karththar Nammudaiya Pidhaakkaludan Pannaamal, Innaalil Inge Uyirodirukkira Nammellaarodum Panninaar.
4 karththar Malaiyile Akkiniyin Naduvilirundhu Mugamugamaai Ungalode Pesinaar.

5 karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Ungalukku Arivikkumbadi, Akkaalaththile Naan Karththarukkum Ungalukkum Naduvaaga Nindren; Neengal Akkinikkup Bayandhu Malaiyil Eraamal Irundheergal; Appozhudhu Avar Sonnadhu Ennavendraal:
6 unnai Adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane.
7 ennaiyandri Unakku Vere Dhevargal Undaayirukkavendaam.
8 mele Vaanaththilum, Keezhe Boomiyilum, Boomiyinkeezhth Thanneerilum Undaayirukkiravaigalukku Oppaana Oru Suroobaththaiyaagilum Yaadhoru Vikkiragaththaiyaagilum Nee Unakku Undaakkavendaam.

9 nee Avaigalai Namaskarikkavum Sevikkavum Vendaam; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraayirukkira Naan Erichchalulla Dhevanaayirundhu, Ennaip Pagaikkiravargalaikkuriththup Pidhaakkaludaiya Akkiramaththaip Pillaigalidaththil Moondraam Naangaam Thalaimuraimattum Visaarikkiravaraayirukkiren.
10 ennidaththil Anbukoorndhu, En Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollugiravargalukko Aayiram Thalaimuraimattum Irakkanjeygiravaraayirukkiren.
11 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Veenile Vazhangaadhiruppaayaaga; Karththar Thammudaiya Naamaththai Veenile Vazhangugiravanaith Thandiyaamal Vidaar.
12 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Oivunaalaip Parisuththamaai Aasarippaayaaga.
13 aarunaalum Nee Velaiseydhu, Un Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Nadappippaayaaga.

14 ezhaam Naalo Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Oivunaal; Adhile Neeyaanaalum, Un Kumaaranaanaalum, Un Kumaaraththiyaanaalum, Un Velaikkaaranaanaalum, Un Velaikkaariyaanaalum, Un Erudhaanaalum, Un Kazhudhaiyaanaalum, Unakku Irukkira Matrendha Mirugajeevanaanaalum, Un Vaasalgalil Irukkira Anniyanaanaalum Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam; Nee Ilaippaaruvadhupola Un Velaikkaaranum Un Velaikkaariyum Ilaippaaravendum;

15 nee Egipthudhesaththil Adimaiyaayirundhaai Endrum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Avvidaththilirundhu Vallamaiyulla Karaththinaalum Ongiya Puyaththinaalum Purappadappanninaar Endrum Ninaippaayaaga; Aagaiyaal Oivunaalai Aasarikka Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kattalaiyittaar.

16 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkira Dhesaththile Un Naatkal Neediththiruppadharkum, Nee Nandraayiruppadharkum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Ganampannuvaayaaga.
17 kolai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga.
18 vibasaaramj Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga
19 kalavu Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga
20 piranukku Virodhamaagap Poisaatchi Sollaadhiruppaayaaga.

21 piranudaiya Manaiviyai Ichchiyaadhiruppaayaaga; Piranudaiya Veettaiyum, Avanudaiya Nilaththaiyum, Avanudaiya Velaikkaaranaiyum, Avanudaiya Velaikkaariyaiyum, Avanudaiya Erudhaiyum, Avanudaiya Kazhudhaiyaiyum, Pinnum Piranukkulla Yaadhondraiyum Ichchiyaadhiruppaayaaga Endraar.

22 indha Vaarththaigalai Karththar Malaiyile Akkiniyilum Megaththilum Kaarirulilum Irundhu Ungal Sabaiyaar Ellaarodum Magaa Saththaththudane Sonnaar; Avaigalodu Ondrum Koottaamal, Avaigalai Irandu Karpalagaigalil Ezhudhi, Ennidaththil Koduththaar.
23 malai Akkiniyaal Erikaiyil Irulin Naduvilirundhu Undaana Saththaththai Neengal Kettapodhu, Koththirath Thalaivarum Moopparumaagiya Neengal Ellaarum Ennidaththil Vandhu:

24 idho, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakkuth Thammudaiya Magimaiyaiyum Thammudaiya Magaththuvaththaiyum Kaanbiththaar; Akkiniyin Naduvilirundhu Undaana Avarudaiya Saththaththaiyum Kettom; Dhevan Manushanode Pesiyum, Avan Uyirodirukkiradhai Innaalile Kandom.
25 ippozhudhu Naangal Saavaanen? Indhap Periya Akkini Engalaip Patchikkume; Naangal Innum Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththaik Ketpomaagil Saavom.
26 naangal Kettadhupola, Akkiniyin Naduvilirundhu Pesugira Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Saththaththai Maamsamaanavargalil Yaaraavadhu Kettu Uyirodirundhadhu Undo?

27 neere Sameebiththuppoi, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Solvadhaiyellaam Kettu, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Solvadhaiyellaam Neere Engalukkuch Sollavendum; Naangal Kettu, Adhinbadiye Seyvom Endreergal.
28 neengal Ennode Pesugaiyil, Karththar Ungal Vaarththaigalaik Kettu, Karththar Ennai Nokki: Indha Janangal Unnode Sonna Vaarththaigalaik Ketten; Avargal Sonnadhu Ellaam Nandraaich Sonnaargal.
29 avargalum Avargal Pillaigalum Endrendraikkum Nandraayirukkumbadi, Avargal Ennaalum Enakkup Bayandhu, En Karpanaigalaiyellaam Kaikkolvadharketra Irudhayam Avargalukku Irundhaal Nalamaayirukkum.

30 nee Poi: Ungal Koodaarangalukkuth Thirumbippongal Endru Avargalukkuch Sol.neeyo Inge Ennidaththil Nil; Naan Avargalukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkum Dhesaththil Avargal Seyyumbadi Nee Avargalukkup Podhikkavendiya Sagala Karpanaigalaiyum Kattalaigalaiyum Niyaayangalaiyum Unakkuch Solluven Endraar.
31 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukkuk Karpiththapadiye Seyyach Saavadhaanamaayirungal; Valadhupuram Idadhupuram Saayaadhiruppeergalaaga.
32 neengal Sudhandharikkum Dhesaththile Pizhaiththuch Sugiththu Neediththirukkumbadi, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukku Vidhiththa Vazhigalellaavatrilum Nadakkakkadaveergal.
